seniority_level.evidence: Title does not include seniority level, but required experience is 3-5 years which aligns with mid-level roles

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly mentions 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on data pipelines and ingestion

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on SFTP, data transfers, and scheduled tasks like monthly SOC controls and software updates suggests batch ETL processing

leadership_expectation.evidence: Responsibilities emphasize individual tasks (scripting, troubleshooting, monitoring) with no leadership or mentoring duties mentioned

primary_cloud.evidence: Azure Cloud is listed as a must-have skill, while AWS and GCP are only mentioned as nice-to-have

secondary_clouds.evidence: AWS and GCP are mentioned as nice-to-have skills under cloud platforms

processing_paradigm.evidence: SFTP data transfers and monthly SOC controls indicate batch processing focus, no streaming tools mentioned

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools like Airflow, Luigi, or cloud-native orchestrators explicitly mentioned

storage_layer.evidence: No explicit mention of data warehouse, lake, or lakehouse technologies beyond SFTP-related storage

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Cincinnati, OH with no mention of remote work flexibility beyond potential hybrid

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone requirements or team distribution details provided

relocation_required.evidence: No relocation package or requirement mentioned, location specified as Cincinnati, OH without further context

h1b_friendly.evidence: No mention of visa sponsorship in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No explicit mention of OPT/CPT or student visa support, and no welcoming tone for students

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work authorization requirements explicitly stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type stated as full-time permanent, which typically aligns with W2 employment

mentorship_signals.evidence: No signals of mentorship or working with senior engineers beyond typical collaboration

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion or advancement paths

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal mobility or role changes in the job posting

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks explicitly or implicitly mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Most skills are listed as must-have with strict qualifiers, and only a few nice-to-have skills mentioned

scope_definition.evidence: Job description is focused on SFTP data engineering with well-defined responsibilities

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required 3-5 years of experience aligns well with mid-level data engineering roles, no unrealistic skill combinations
